A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie was awful. It was way too long for its little content. 
Also there was never really a sensible character development. 

In Comparison with the other Star Wars movies\, this was the worst of them. 
Star Wars V: The empire strikes back\, has shown us that a really good second part in a trilogy is possible. And Star Wars: The Last Jedi\, was the opposite of that.
